title: General
fullText:
The wiring system used for the supply, control, and protection of electrical equipment within a refrigeration room shall be of a type that: (a) will not be affected by the operating temperature of the room; and (b) does not provide pockets or channels in which moisture might accumulate, or through which it might pass into electrical equipment.
Wiring systems not associated with the refrigeration room electrical equipment shall not be taken through, or be installed, in such rooms.
